text: ek sanekin pip ohu ge pasekin wiya.
onna ethana indan mokada wune kiyanna dasuntama ida demu eyage supurudu panditha wakyath ekkama.
eeth me athi...

pasugiya yudha samaye siduwuwayayi pawasena manawa himikam kadawim saha wenath karunu sambandhayen rajayata saha aarakshaka hamudawanta ella wi athi chodana saha yojanawaladi me rate kisidu ranawiruweku withthikaruweku kirimata thama sudanam nomathi bawa janadhipathithuma pawasayi.
thamunta aadare na..
mowunge balaporoththuwada yuropaya mulu muninma bidawattawimayi.

kalinuth dawasak liwa me as gana.2013.12.14,niwasedi,lassana loku as dekak thiyena aadaraniya bassita,ithin bassiye kohomada oyata kiyala mehema ahanna wela thiyenne oya aayemath math ekka tharaha wela nisayi.aayemath kiyala kiwe oya kohomath masekata sarayak,desarayak me widiyata mageth ekkala tharaha wena nisayi mokakma hari hethuwakata.habayi ithin me wathawe nam bassi mageth ekka aththatama hugak tharaha wela kiyalayi mata nam hithenne.eth mama dannawa bassi mageth ekka tharaha wunath hemihita awith meka balanawa kiyala.eka nisayi mama meka methana danne."me tharam siyumalida kalugal" kiyana sinduwa oya harima lassana thaleta mumunanakota eka koyi tharam apuruda....hamadamath eka ahaninna athnam kiyala hithenawa.eka hariyata oyage oyalobha badina loku asdekata ebigena innawa wagekoyi tharam sanasimakda..ee sinduwe hatiyata kalugaluth siyumalinam mata nam kohomawath hitha ganna ba oyage hitha wane wage wenne kohomada kiyala.habayi wane unath ekthara uushnathwayakadi namenawa.mama kohomath dannawa oyage hitha wane nowana bawa.eka nisa bassiye wane nowana lassana hithak wane wage karaganna epa.moko mama dannawa oya oya hitha gal karagena inneth aayasayakin kiyala.ehema oyainna kota wenne oyage oya lassana muhuna kaluwela katha wena eka witharayi bassiye.

ohu mohothak yawwaniya desa bala sita siya datha digu kaleya.

shri maha bodhiyenma ankurayak thama wiharasthanayata, gamata laba dun wita bahutharaya nihanda karagatha hakiyayi owun sithanne ebawini.
siddhiyata adalawa apa kondesi kada kirime chodana mathayi sakakaruwan yali athadanguwata ganu labuwe.
ehi pa්rathipalaya nishpadana wiyadama wadiwimayi.

wipakshaye podu apekshaka maithripala sirisenata aadhara pinisa eksath jathika pakshaye nayaka ranil wikramasinhage pradhanathwayen pawathwimata sanwidhanaya keruna raswim bhumiye sawi kara thibuna shabda wikashana yanthrawala widuli rahan kapa, kodi wal galawamin siti pirisak wisin ella karana lada praharayak samanga gatuma aarambha wu bawayi raswime sanwidhayakayan pawasanne.
//samahara poth liyanne kathruge thrupthiya ha ohuta wani intarests athi ayage prayojanaya ha rasawindima sandaha pamani//
dan mata wayasa awurudu haththa atayi.

mage abhirachi yatathe athi goliya ginumata piwisiya nohaka.goliya ginum thathwaya: sanyuktha kerunu ginuma bhawitha nokaramin yanuwen dakwayi.eeta pahalin athi obage goliya ginumata piwisenna yana link eka klik kala wita mage mura padaya illa sitiyi.mage niwaradi mura padaya ma athul kala namuth pahatha dakwa athi ayurin dosha paniwudayak disweyi.
aandu pakshaya widiyata wiruddha yojanawak aawoth janadhipathiwarayayi aanduwayi anawashya happillakata yanawa.
maligawa pitathin penenne natabun godak lesaya.

ee athara athi loku ma gataluwa wanne lokayathana jyothishaya ho jyothisha ganitha siddhantha ho pilibandawa abamal renuwaka tharam wath adhyanayak no kala aya da mathupitin athapatha ga anawaki prakashayata path kirima ya.
eeth ada kantha dinayata eliyata panina, "illim" postar katawut, edata witharakma simawuna pradarshanayak ganata mata penenne.

hisa matha daෑth ruwa wilapa thabuwo ya.eheth; me danduwam himi wuye; jiwathwime ayithiya himiwa thibu tharunayakuge maranaya sidu kala bawata sakshi wimasa; sadharana sakayakin thorawa oppu wu waradakaruwan dasa denakuta ya.meya athitha raja dawase patan pruthugisi, roma landesi, kolbaෲk kamaran, 1972-1978 kala wakawanu athulath ithihasayaka methek nowu suwisheshi nadu thinduwak wuye, wadi pirisakata ekawara (dasa denekuta) marana danduwam niyama kirima mathaya.meyata pera ata denakuta prasiddhiye ella marime danduwam himi wuye, 1857 di kagalle juliyas appu maru waradataya.
man ethaninma nawaththannam “ “ naha man methanin bahinnam “ idiripasa wanguwen wanaya harawu ohu nawathath supurudu mawathata awathirna wi , godage poth madura aasannaye wahanaya nawathwiya.
man ahala thibuna eeka ethana guwan palamakda hayiwe ekakda manda hadanna hadapu ekak kiyala (man hariyatama dan na)
thisara perera mita pera ikuth wasaredi sha්ri lanka wissayi wissa kandayama niyojanaya karamin pakisthanaye sancharaya kala athara ohu pakisthan pa්rimiyar lig tharagawaliyatada sahabhagi wiya.
api obata kiyanne 13 wani sanshodhanaya thula wadi wi sitinna kiya nowe.
kalu jathikayanta siduwana asadharanaya lokaya hamuwe helidaraw karamin pawasuwaya.
risaw eke hitiya niladhariya, mage jangama durakathanaya, mudal pasumbiya, ehi thibu salli, jathika handunumpatha raugena mawa kuduwata damma.
aakramana dekakin pasu parihani wu joson samajaya naga situwima ehi aramuna wiya.
ada api maithripala sirisena janadhipathithuma apita ilakkayak labadi thibenawa.
kohoma unath dan ithin kamak na mama welawata wade karala gennamko....

ee wagema kattiya liyanne kament balagena, hits balagena.
ohu aya desa helu balma kisidu hangimak nomathi ekak wiya.
oyata klark gana hagimak thiyenawa ehema ne , kloyi ?

wathman aanduwe waraya ha nawika katayuthu amathya arjuna ranathunga mahathage sahodara nishantha ranathunga da madhyawedi rohan waliwita da rabinath pa්ranandu kawishan disanayaka yana mahathwarun da sitinne bandhanagarayeya.

udaharanayak lesa wasara 60k 70k thisse indiyawen wanija wahana aanayanaya karana samagamak, thawamath sidukaranne ema wanija wahana gedi pitin aanayanaya kirima pamanayi (ma danna hatiyata - waradi nam niwaradi karanna).

“ eekayano ayan bhikkhawe saththanan wishuddhiya - soka pariddhawanan samathikkamaya – dukkha domanassanan aththangamaya – nyayassa adhigamaya nibbanassa sawichikiriyaya yadidan chaththaro sathipattana, ” ehi arutha wanne “ mahaneni ekama eka margayak atha sathwayage pirisudu wima pinisa, shoka kirima, handa walapim, susum helim duralima pinisath, dukkha domanassayage niruddhiya pinisath (thamange nokaraganima), siwsas dharmayange awabodhaya pinisath, enam sathara sathipattanayayi.
namuth umbae katatayi, angatayi.

krumi karmanthaye di krumin jiwa widyathmaka palanaya yanu wilopikathawa, paraposhithathawa, shaka bhakshakathawa ho anekuth swabhawika yanthrana matha randa pawathina palibodha (krumin, weyan,wal pala ha shaka roga athuluwa) palana kramayaki.

“me pasala ba/walasbadda aar.em.di. rathnayaka maha widyalaya lesin namkirima thamayi dayananda rathnayaka hitapu widuhalpathithuma wenuwen kala yuthu, kala haki lokuma upaharaya.

aya sama witama jastin sudu charithayak se penwimata nogath piyawarak nathi tharamya.
mokada ithin eeka apita hitha gannama ba.
ehema loku salliyak thibuna nam me kaleta wela mehema dukwindinne na…’

lankawe deshapalana anagathaya gana anawaki kiyanna amaru wunath danata penna thiyenne maitha්ri mahinda pa්rathiwirodhaya uga්rawela sha්rilanipaya dekada wena thaththwayak.

saranga mendis wisin adhyakshanaya karanu labana ‘bharyawo’ telinatyaye nishpadikawa wana sudarma neththikumara ha ema telinatyaye thirarachanaya karanu labu injineru ha idikirim amathya wimal wirawansha amathithumage birindawana shashi wirawansha athara wishala gatumak hatagena athi bawa wartha we.mema gatuma sandaha hethuwi aththe sudarma neththikumara amathya wimalwirawansha hata nitharama es.em.es paniwida ewimayi.
idiripath kara athi nidahas prasada warga dekak wana athara pahatha api ema warga dekak sakachcha.

mahithalaye ridmayanukula gigirumen salitha wana lo diya dahara agadhaya pathule bubulu damamin dangalayi raktha thapthawa dilisena lo diye anduru rath pahaya kandu sikhara matha widabarawa randuna andhakara walakulu giniyam pahayakin diduluwayi siyak gawwak gambauru agadhaya depasa sita rathwan wu deneth walin wihidena thiyunu rathu eli dalwa api ekineka desa balamu rath pahayen dalwena niruwath siruru aagadhaya pathule sita nagena lodiye unusumin unusumwa galayana swedayen aalepanaya wi dileyi didulayi deneth walin wihidennawu rathwan aaloka kadambhayo ekineka ha patali ape siruru ekineka wetha pasunoba ya haki aakarshanayakin adithi api pawi adi gos agadhayata ihala ahasedi ekineka ha weli patali lodiyen piri aagadhaya pathulata ada watemu dag dag ga gahena papu kuhara thulin nagena bol handa mihithalaye gigirumath samaga ekwa maha ghoshawak wa aseyi lodiye unusumin giniyam wu maruthaya dekan asala lathoni demin ape siruru wiyala giniyam karayi athla matha thaba ambaarena thetha mati pindu dwayak men ape siruru ekineka ha weli ambaari lodiye unusumin dawi ekama eka padartha guliyak wa agadhaya pathulatha giniyam lo diya gangawa wetha ada wateyi giniyamin giniyam wana siruru washpa wi ginigena dawena gini guliya mada ekineka ha weli musuwi ambaarena thetha mati pindu dwaya ekineka ha welemin ekineka mathin lissa yamin ekama eka mati pindakwa nosansunwa bameyi agadhaya pathulatha giniyam lo diyehi gilena ginigath gini guliya ginigena dawi sahalluwen sahalluwana ekama eka aathmayakwa lodiya kalderam pathulathin ilpi igili ahasata nagi walakulu atharin ringa wiyanakwa bandi andhakara walasalu ihalin suryalokaye mandasmithiya galayana isawwe seda kendi men pathira yana sudo sudu duhulu wala bindak wi pawa yayi yanthamata unusum mada pawana lathawewi hamayi sansun susum handa lathawakata ihala pahala yana layanwitha giyakwa aseyi alutha sedu kes walin nagena siyum suwanda ihalata ganena husma ha weli with penahalu purawalayi “mata athi...

ramith rambaukwallata dada saha dadi awawada batahira indiya kodewhi pawathi shri lanka "ee" - kodew "ee" krikat tharagawaliyata sahabhagi wi aapasu emin sitiya di guwan yanaye dorak arimata thathkala bawata chodana labu kridaka ramith rambaukwallata sancharayen ohuta himi (rupiyal laksha 3kata aasanna) mudalin dada washayen 50% k kapa hara dadi lesa awawada kirimata shri lanka krikat widhayakaya thiranaya kara atha.

pasugiya sathi thuna thisse aanduwa, wadakarana janathawage ha gambada pidithayinge jiwana kondesi thawaduratath kabasiniya karamin, athyawashya bhanda mila darunu lesa ihala nanwa atha.

aanduwe abhyanthara aaranchimarga sandahan karana aakarayata, maha banku adhipathiwarayage ka්riya kalapaya hethuwen yahapalana aanduwa apahasuthawata saha apakirthiyata pathwana bawa pawasamin ohuge sewa kalaya dirgha kirimata wiruddhawa siti sha්ri lanka nidahas pakshaye piris samanga sidu kala sakachcha ekangathawa matha mema thiranayata pamina atha.
obath wishwasayen yuthuwa sudusu aayurweda prathikara mangin nirogi suwaya labaganna.
japan bath wala alena sulu sobawaya nisa kotu deken kanna ithama pahasuyi.
ko, gana kiyanawa?
ithihasaya nodanna pudgalayin mathiwaranaya warjanaya karana lesa prakasha karamin sitiyi.
jud ewita mahindata kiwe mewannakya.
eheth prathipalayak nathi thana ohu kalakiri sitiyeya.
panath ketumpatha pilibandawa pethsam wibhagaya aarambhawu ape්ral 5 wanada wana wita mema pethsam sadaha madihathwana pethsam 8k da idiripathwi thibini.
nangi kamareta kadagena aawa.

“janapathi nila mehewara” jangama sewaye pasuwiparam wadasatahanak ada (11) perawaruwe janadhipathi garu maitha්ripala sirisena mathithumage pa්radhanathwayen polonnaruwa distha්rik lekam karyala sha්rawanagarayedi pawathwini.pasugiya da polonnaruwe aarambha kerunu janapathi nila mehewara wadasatahanedi yojana wu paridi higurakgoda pa්radeshiya lekam kottashaye paha wasara shishyathwaya samath wu darudariyanta thilina pa්radanaya da janadhipathithuma athin siduwini.thilina sadaha anugrahaya shrama wasana aramudala magin laba di thibuni.
